name: Conquer (itch) (alexmanni)
description:
Conquer is an online multiplayer FPS game.  You have 3 lives, limited ammunition and medkit scattered on the level to beat your friends. Try it now!

Input control:

W - Forward

S - Backward

A - Left

D - Right

Shift - Run

Left mouse  - Fire

Right mouse - Aim

Button 1 - Health recovery when it is less than 50% and you have collected at least 1 Medkit

System requirement:

-GeForce GTX 1050 or more

Stay tuned for the next update!

This game has been developed as project for the Virtual Reality course of the Polytechnic  University of Turin, 2020, by Alessandro Manni
